1: The decree of the Lord to my lord:[a] “Sit at my right hand until I make your enemies a footstool under your feet.”
2: The Lord will stretch out your strong scepter from Zion. Rule in the midst of your enemies.
3: Your people will be willing on the day of your power. In majesty of holiness, from the womb of the dawn, the dew of your youth will be yours.[b]
4: The Lord has sworn and will not change his mind: “You are a priest forever, in the manner of Melchizedek.”
5: The Lord is at your right hand. He will crush kings on the day of his wrath.
6: He will judge the nations. He will fill valleys with corpses.[c] He will crush heads over the wide world.[d]
7: He will drink from a stream beside the way; therefore, he will lift up his head.
